footer.tagline: Wurin da zaku sami ingantattun bayanai game da matsalar wutar lantarki da sakamakon jarrabawa a Najeriya.
footer.discoCustomerCare: Jerin Kula da Abokan Ciniki na DisCo
footer.copyright: © {year} NaijaInfo. Duk hanyoyin haɗin gwiwa na hukuma suna kaiwa zuwa shafukan gwamnati.

disclaimer.title: Sanarwar Tabbatar da Bayanai
disclaimer.text: Ana tabbatar da bayanan tuntuɓar da hanyoyin haɗi daga hanyoyin hukuma. Koyaushe ku bincika tare da sanarwar hukuma na DisCo da hukumar jarrabawa.

badge.planned: Tsayar da wuta da aka tsara
badge.unplanned: Katse wuta ba tare da shiri ba

plannedOutages.header: Tsayar da wuta da aka tsara

homepage.title: Nigeria Power & Exam Results Hub
homepage.description: Central source for Nigeria power outage updates, DisCo contacts, and official JAMB, WAEC, NECO result guides.

outages.title: Nigeria Power Outage Updates
outages.description: Official outage information for all Nigerian DisCos with reporting steps, contact numbers, and safety guides.

results.title: Nigeria Exam Results Hub
results.description: Official JAMB, WAEC, and NECO result guides with portal links, verification steps, and troubleshooting tips.

hero.title: Nigeria Power & Exam Results Hub
hero.subtitle: Bayanai na lokaci-lokaci game da matsalar wutar lantarki, hanyoyin ba da rahoto, da tabbatattu matakan duba JAMB, WAEC, da NECO ba tare da lalata bayananku ba.

officialAlert.title: Hanyoyin Hukuma Kawai
officialAlert.description: Duk sakamakon jarrabawa da bayanan matsalar wutar lantarki suna hada kai tsaye zuwa shafukan hukuma na gwamnati da DisCo. Ba ma adana ko aiki da bayanan sirri.

powerCard.title: Sabuntawar Matsalar Wutar Lantarki
powerCard.description: Bi diddigin katsewa da gyare-gyaren da aka tsara a fadin DisCos na Najeriya tare da matakan ba da rahoto kai tsaye.
items: Matsayin grid na ƙasa daga TCN
Jerin tuntuɓar DisCos 12 da Aba Power
Yadda ake ba da rahoton matsala ta wayar hannu, SMS, ko apps
Shawarwarin tsaro don generators da inverters

examCard.title: Mai Duban Sakamakon Jarrabawa
examCard.description: Matakan mataki-mataki don duba sakamakon hukuma na JAMB, WAEC, da NECO da tabbatarwa.
items: JAMB e-Facility, CAPS, da sakamakon SMS
Magance matsalolin sakamakon da suka saba

emergency.title: Kuna Buƙatar Taimakon Gaggawa?
emergency.description: Don matsalolin wutar lantarki na gaggawa, tuntuɓi kulawar abokan ciniki na DisCo na yankinku. Don matsalolin sakamakon jarrabawa, tuntuɓi layukan taimako na hukumar jarrabawa.

knowledgeBase.title: Bincika Cikakken Tushen Ilimi
knowledgeBase.description: Jagororin sama da 30 sun shafi ba da rahoton katsewa, mita prepaid, tsaron katsewa, da matakan tabbatar da jarrabawa.

hero.title: Sabuntawar Matsalar Wutar Lantarki na Najeriya
hero.subtitle: Bi diddigin matsayin grid na ƙasa, sami bayanan katsewa na musamman na wuri, da samun jagororin ba da rahoto mataki-mataki don kowace Kamfanin Rarraba.

howToSection.title: Jagororin Yadda-Za
howToSection.subtitle: Koyi yadda ake ba da rahoton katsewa, gano mai ciyar da ku, da kasancewa lafiya lokacin katsewa tare da ɗan taƙaitaccen abun ciki mataki-mataki.

resourceSection.title: Ɗakin Karatu na Albarkatu
resourceSection.subtitle: Ajiye jerin tuntuɓar muhimmai, kalandar gyare-gyare, da shawarwarin mita prepaid don saurin nunawa.

alert.title: Kasance Sananne ta Hanya Mai Kyau
alert.description: Bincika sabuntawar kafofin watsa labarun da hanyoyin hukuma na DisCo da aka haɗa a sama. Don rikice-rikicen grid na ƙasa, ko da yaushe tabbatar tare da Kamfanin Watsawa na Najeriya (TCN) kafin raba faɗakarwa.

examCta.title: Kuna Buƙatar Taimakon Jarrabawa Maimakon?
examCta.description: Ziyarci Cibiyar Sakamakon don jagora na JAMB, WAEC, da NECO tare da hanyoyin hukuma da matakan warwarewa.

hero.title: Cibiyar Sakamakon Jarrabawa na Najeriya
hero.subtitle: Yi amfani da hanyoyin hukuma don duba makinku, buga fale-falen, da tabbatar da sakamako. Kowace jagora tana da hanyoyin haɗi na gaskiya, kudade, da matakan warwarewa.

jambSection.title: Jagororin JAMB
jambSection.subtitle: Sami damar sakamakon UTME, matsayin karɓa, da zaɓuɓɓukan SMS na hukuma akan shafin e-Facility.

waecSection.title: Jagororin WAEC
waecSection.subtitle: Koyi yadda ake amfani da WAEC e-PINs, gyara kurakurai na yau da kullun, da tabbatar da sakamakon ɗan takara lafiya.

necoSection.title: Jagororin NECO
necoSection.subtitle: Sayi alamun NECO, duba sakamakon SSCE, da tabbatar da takaddun shaida tare da e-Verify.

alert.title: Kare Bayanan Sirrinku
alert.description: Kawai shigar da lambobin rajista, PINs, ko alamun akan hanyoyin hukuma da aka haɗa a sama. Ba ma sarrafa ko tabbatar da sakamakon ku—duk maɓallan suna kai ku kai tsaye zuwa WAEC, NECO, ko JAMB. Ku guje wa shafukan ɓangare na uku da ke iƙirarin inganta maki ko karɓar kuɗi ba tare da rasit ba.

outageCta.title: Kuna Buƙatar Sabuntawar Matsalar Wutar Lantarki?
outageCta.description: Bincika masu bin diddigi na katsewa na DisCo, jerin tuntuɓar, da shawarwarin tsaro a fadin Najeriya.

guidePages.outageDisclaimer: Kullum dogara ne akan hanyoyin hukuma na DisCo don tabbatar da katsewa. Wannan jagorar ta taƙaita bayanan jama'a don taimaka muku ɗaukar mataki da sauri lokacin katsewa.
guidePages.resultDisclaimer: Kullum yi amfani da hanyoyin jarrabawa na hukuma. Ba ma adana bayananka ko duba sakamakon a madadinka; duk matakan nan suna kai ka kai tsaye zuwa WAEC, NECO, ko JAMB.

disclaimers.outage: Kullum dogara da hanyoyin hukumar DisCo don tabbatar da katsewa. Wannan jagorar ta taƙaita bayanan jama'a don taimaka maka ka yi aiki da sauri yayin katsewa.
disclaimers.result: Kullum yi amfani da shafukan jarrabawa na hukuma. Ba ma adana bayananka ko duba sakamakon ka; duk hanyoyin nan suna kai ka kai tsaye zuwa WAEC, NECO, ko JAMB.
